column2: ‘He is not teaching her how to make financial decisions or to engage psychologically with the responsibilities of wealth.’
column4: My daughter, 29, will inherit a ‘substantial sum’ from her late grandfather. But my husband maintains a tight grip on her trust.

column2: China says that the US's attempts to "provoke splits and misunderstandings" will not work, after US Secretary of State Antony Blinken urged China to cease "aggressive actions" in the Asia-Pacific. President Joe Biden's administration is trying to reset relations and reassert its influence in Asia after the turbulence and unpredictability of the Donald Trump era.
column4: China responds to Blinken's 'aggressive actions' remarks
